system.controller

Class LeapMotionListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.leapmotion.leap.Listener
      • system.controller.LeapMotionListener

  • public class LeapMotionListener
extends com.leapmotion.leap.Listener
    This class is the Custom Listener extend from the Leap Motion Listener. Different function is called at different connection state.
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Andy Tsang
